name: Steady Breathing
title: Chongyun: Steady Breathing
desc: Steady breathing makes a steady heart.
inPlayDescription: When your Chongyun, who has this card equipped, creates a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chonghua Frost Field, it gains the following effects: Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks to deal +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chongyun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chongyun, equip this card.After Chongyun equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Chonghua's Layered Frost once.When your Chongyun, who has this card equipped, creates a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chonghua Frost Field, it will have the following effects: Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks to deal +1 DMG.(You must have Chongyun in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
